name: Colors of life
description:
Hi everyone!

I am a 14 years old boy from Hungary and I made the Colors of life.

This is a low poly design game, where you have to revive an island. But it's just the main theme. Colors of life is based on details. You have to complete 5 different type of ordeals. For the best experience pay attention to every little thing. After the ending, you will understand everything.

On Google Play it is a paid game. So if you liked it I would really appreciate if you buy it or donate me.
